templates.promptTemplate: A hand wearing a black glove inserts a card printed with {artwork} into a silver, metallic machine. The brand name "veo3video.me" is printed on the front of the machine. After the card is fully inserted, the camera pans down. The outlet of the machine is directly aligned with a {cup_style} cup. Once the liquid is poured into the cup, it quickly forms a rotating vortex at the bottom. The various colors dynamically interweave and blend with the vortex. As more liquid is poured, these colors eventually perfectly replicate the {artwork}, like a magical piece of artistic latte art. ASMR sound effects.

templates.name: ASMR Surreal Toast Spread
templates.description: Use various unexpected miniature objects as butter to spread on toast, creating a visually shocking ASMR experience
templates.promptTemplate: A super-realistic HD close-up: showing a hand tilting and shaking a {container_type} to dump out {item_quantity} {miniature_items} onto a thick golden slice of freshly baked toast with a crispy surface. The miniature objects tumble out chaotically with satisfying metallic clanks, plastic clicks, and crystalline chimes - some landing upside down, others sideways, many bouncing and rolling with realistic physics as they hit the toast surface. Each object reflects the warm studio lights differently: metal surfaces gleaming with mirror-like reflections, gems refracting rainbow colors, electronic devices flickering with LED lights, and smooth plastic creating subtle highlights. The objects create distinctive impact sounds - heavy metallic thuds from gold bars, sharp crystalline pings from gems, hollow plastic taps from LEGO bricks, and electronic beeps from devices. Then using a knife to attempt to spread these miniature objects on the toast, creating an extraordinary tactile contrast between the cold, hard surfaces of the items and the warm, soft bread. The knife blade scrapes against metal objects with sharp metallic sounds, pushes smooth gems across the bread creating grinding textures, and nudges electronic components that continue blinking and beeping. Some round objects roll away from the knife's pressure, while angular ones create interesting patterns and indentations in the bread surface. The whole scene emphasizes the surreal contrast between inedible objects and food preparation, with each material creating unique sounds - metallic scraping, plastic clicking, electronic humming, and glass tinkling - all softly illuminated by warm studio lights. The shallow depth of field blurs the background, focusing on the texture contrast between the soft toast and hard miniature objects. Shot from top to bottom, ASMR cooking video perspective - creating maximum visual shock through the bizarre juxtaposition of using non-food objects as spreadable ingredients.

templates.name: Baby Adult Anxiety Comedy
templates.description: Cinematic close-up of a worried baby expressing various adult anxieties with custom response options
templates.promptTemplate: A cinematic long take, an extreme close-up shot. The focus is on a sunlit nursery where a baby, around one year old, looks deeply sad and worried. The background features a cream-colored carpet and a baby crib, beautifully blurred to create a stunning depth of field with excellent bokeh. The camera captures a continuous action: First, the baby lifts his head, his eyes welling with tears, his expression filled with profound sorrow. He lets out a heavy, world-weary sigh, facing the camera directly. (The frame is a tight single shot on the baby; no one else appears). At this moment, a gentle, adult female voice asks from off-screen in {response_language}: '{interview_question}' Then, a black microphone enters the frame, moving into position right in front of the baby. The baby replies in a desperate, childish voice in {response_language}: '{baby_answer}' Both the interviewer and baby speak clearly in {response_language} language with appropriate accents and pronunciation.

templates.name: Bigfoot Survival Vlog
templates.description: POV selfie footage of Bigfoot demonstrating wilderness survival skills with customizable voiceover content
templates.promptTemplate: POV selfie of a realistic male Bigfoot in {weather_condition} conditions during {time_of_day}, holding a selfie stick with the camera at the end, and a GoPro mounted on forehead. {activity_description} The scene unfolds in a pristine wilderness setting with towering pine trees and ancient oaks forming a natural canopy overhead. Dappled sunlight filters through the dense foliage, creating dramatic light and shadow patterns on the forest floor covered with fallen leaves and moss-covered rocks. In the background, distant mountains rise majestically while a gentle breeze rustles through the branches. The air is crisp and clean, filled with the earthy scents of the wild forest. Natural sounds of chirping birds and rustling wildlife provide an authentic wilderness atmosphere. National Geographic style, HD quality with cinematic depth of field. Voiceover in deep, gruff voice: '{voiceover_content}'

options.label: Foraging ğŸ‡
options.activity_description: He holds a large fern leaf filled with freshly picked, dew-covered wild berries. He brings a berry close to the camera lens to inspect it, a curious expression on his face.
options.voiceover_content: Alright, first thing's first... breakfast. Found some good ones today. You gotta know which ones to pick, though.

options.label: Morning Exercise ğŸ’ª
options.activity_description: He performs stretching exercises and basic calisthenics, demonstrating impressive flexibility despite his massive frame. He does push-ups against a fallen log, his movements surprisingly graceful.
options.voiceover_content: Gotta stay in shape for survival out here. Stretching keeps me flexible and ready for anything.

options.label: Water Search ğŸ’§
options.activity_description: He kneels by a crystal-clear stream, cupping water in his massive hands to taste it. He examines the flow and clarity, nodding approvingly at the quality.
options.voiceover_content: Clean water is life. Let's find a good stream nearby. This one's perfect - clear, cold, and flowing fast.

options.label: Shelter Building ğŸ
options.activity_description: He uses his immense strength to wedge a massive, heavy log into the frame of a lean-to. He grunts with effort, looking directly into the camera as if sharing the struggle.
options.voiceover_content: This one's a bit heavy. But, uh... gotta make sure the frame is solid. Should be pretty cozy tonight.

options.label: Tool Making ğŸ”¨
options.activity_description: He carefully sharpens a long wooden branch into a spear, using a rough stone to scrape and shape the tip. His precise movements show years of experience.
options.voiceover_content: A sharp spear makes all the difference in survival. Takes patience, but it's worth the effort.

options.label: Hunting/Fishing ğŸ£
options.activity_description: He stands waist-deep in a forest stream, holding a handmade spear with complete stillness, waiting for the perfect moment to strike at passing fish.
options.voiceover_content: Patience is key when you're fishing. Nature provides if you wait and stay perfectly still.

options.label: Territory Exploration ğŸ—ºï¸
options.activity_description: He climbs to a high vantage point, scanning the landscape with keen eyes. He points to different areas, mentally mapping the territory and resources.
options.voiceover_content: Never know what you'll find over that ridge. Adventure awaits, but smart exploration keeps you alive.

options.label: Fire Preparation ğŸ”¥
options.activity_description: He cups his massive hands around a small tinder bundle. He gently blows on a glowing ember he just created, and the first tiny flame flickers to life, illuminating his face with warm, orange glow.
options.voiceover_content: There we go... c'mon, c'mon... yes! We have fire. Now we can get cookin'.

options.label: Food Processing ğŸ¥˜
options.activity_description: He skillfully cleans and prepares freshly caught fish, using a sharp stone knife to remove scales and prepare portions for cooking.
options.voiceover_content: Prep time is crucial for a good meal. Details matter when you're working with fresh catch.

options.label: Security Check ğŸ›¡ï¸
options.activity_description: He systematically checks the perimeter of his campsite, reinforcing the shelter and ensuring all food is properly stored away from potential threats.
options.voiceover_content: Better safe than sorry in the wilderness. Check everything twice before settling in for the night.

options.label: Cooking Dinner ğŸ–
options.activity_description: He holds a large, freshly caught fish speared on a sharpened stick over a crackling campfire. He rotates the stick slowly, examining the cooking fish with a satisfied look.
options.voiceover_content: Nothing beats fresh-caught trout roasted over an open fire. Smells... amazing.

options.label: Food Storage ğŸ¥“
options.activity_description: He carefully wraps portions of cooked fish in large leaves and hangs them high in trees, creating a natural food cache for future meals.
options.voiceover_content: Tomorrow's meals start with tonight's prep. Smart planning keeps you fed in the wilderness.

options.label: Night Watch ğŸ‘ï¸
options.activity_description: He sits alertly by the dying campfire, ears perked and eyes scanning the dark forest. Every sound is catalogued and assessed for potential threats.
options.voiceover_content: Forest gets different sounds at night. Stay alert, but don't let paranoia ruin your rest.

options.label: Stargazing ğŸŒŒ
options.activity_description: He leans back against his log shelter and looks up in awe at a brilliant, star-filled sky. The camera is held low, capturing the bottom of his chin and the vast Milky Way above.
options.voiceover_content: Not a bad day's work. It's quiet out here. Stars remind you how small we really are.

options.label: Bedtime Prep ğŸ˜´
options.activity_description: He arranges his makeshift bedding and checks that the fire is properly banked for the night. He takes one last look around before settling in.
options.voiceover_content: Time to rest. Tomorrow's another adventure in the wild. Sleep well out there.

templates.name: CCTV Animal Rider Surveillance
templates.description: Night-vision CCTV footage of various animal riders approaching camera with customizable provocative gestures
templates.promptTemplate: Night-vision CCTV realism, monochrome low-lux grain, fixed security cam perspective. Static shot from high-mounted CCTV cam showing a {mount_animal} with a {rider_animal} rider starting in the distance at {location} and walking directly toward the camera, coming to a stop at medium close-up distance. The {rider_animal} MUST remain firmly seated on the {mount_animal}'s back for the entire 8-second duration without dismounting, teleporting, or changing position. Timeline: 0-4s: steady approach with realistic walking gait; 4-5s: complete stop 3 meters from camera, rider braces against momentum change while staying mounted; 5-8s: both animals snap heads to look directly at camera lens, the {mount_animal} displays a wide, unnatural smile by pulling its lips back to expose teeth, while the {rider_animal} - STILL FIRMLY SEATED AND MAINTAINING RIDING POSITION - performs {provocative_gesture} toward the camera using only its upper body and arms, keeping its lower body stable in the riding position on the {mount_animal}'s back. Timestamp 2025-07-27 02:30:15 displayed top-left in white monospace digits. 960Ã—540 resolution, 24fps, desaturated greyscale with slight green tint, coarse digital noise typical of low-lux CCD surveillance systems.

templates.name: Country Historical Evolution
templates.description: Transform ancient maps into living 3D miniature countries with tilt-shift effect

visual_core.description: A tilt-shift, miniature landscape animation depicting the historical evolution of {country_name}. The scene transforms from a 2D {map_style} map into a fully rendered 3D miniature diorama, simulating rapid organic growth.
visual_core.style: 3D rendered miniature model, tilt-shift photography style, macro videography, textured ({texture_materials}), {cultural_style} atmosphere, pop-up book aesthetic.
visual_core.camera: Starts with a high-angle top-down shot of the map, then transitions quickly to a dynamic, slow-orbiting crane shot (macro perspective) that moves across the 3D {country_type} as elements grow.

timeline.action: An {map_color} {map_style} map of {country_name}, showing clear {map_texture} texture, unfolds rapidly to fill the frame.
Miniature models of {landmark_1} organically rise from the map. Simultaneously, {building_style} buildings emerge sequentially at an accelerated pace.
{water_feature} materializes as a glossy {water_color} ribbon. {boat_type} pop onto the water, and {vegetation} sprout rapidly along {vegetation_location}, following the map's green zones.

As the camera completes its orbit, {landmark_2} diffuses into view in the background, while bold 3D text '{country_display_name}' ({text_texture} texture) rises quickly from {text_location} to complete the diorama.

audio.music: {music_style} building quickly to a majestic crescendo.

templates.name: Crystal Fruit Biting ASMR
templates.description: Surrealistic ASMR close-up of biting into crystal-like fruits with customizable colors and materials
templates.promptTemplate: Surrealistic ASMR close-up, a woman gently bites into a smooth, {color} {material}-like {fruit_type}. The surface exudes a soft sheen, rich in texture, with a delicate stem remaining on top, reminiscent of {material} art. Her lips part gently as a fair-skinned hand with neatly trimmed nails cradles the {fruit_type}. Captured in slow motion, she bites into the {fruit_type} flesh, and at the instant of biting, small, {color} {material} fragments burst from between her teeth and lips. These fragments refract soft light, naturally falling down in a slow and rhythmic chewing pace. The moist sound of chewing intertwines with the crisp, subtle cracks characteristic of {material}. Each bite is an ASMR feastâ€”layered, quiet, and delicate, transporting viewers into a sensory haze. Emphasizing touch, sound, and vivid visual details to satisfy ASMR cravings.

templates.name: Energy Object Cutting ASMR
templates.description: Ultra-detailed HD ASMR experience of cutting through various energy objects and supernatural phenomena
templates.promptTemplate: Ultra-detailed HD ASMR video with a human hand slicing through an ultra-realistic {cutting_object} resting on a {cutting_surface}. The blade crackles when it comes into contact with the energy mass, cutting through perfectly to create clean slices with spectacular interior effects and immersive ASMR soundscape. Cinematic lighting accentuates the luminous effects and energy trails. No background distractions. Focus on visual detail and rich, atmospheric ASMR sounds in perfect harmony.

templates.name: Glass Fruit Cutting ASMR
templates.description: Create mesmerizing ASMR videos of cutting translucent glass fruits
templates.promptTemplate: In a surreal close-up, a sharp {knife_type} knife slices through a {color} {fruit} made entirely of translucent {material}, with the blade positioned at the center of the cut. The {fruit} is exquisitely carved, glimmering under {lighting} light, with each detail delicately visible on the surface. As the knife descends to perform {cutting_style}, perfect pieces fall away, each piece dropping as the knife shifts down {slice_thickness} millimeters to the next position, revealing the shiny {material}-like core, its internal texture exquisite, with light cleverly refracted by the transparent material. The scene is set on a {surface}, with soft ambient light reflections and no background distractions. The camera is fixed at the front of the close-up, advancing the cutting action in a slow cinematic style. There is no music, no cinematic black bars, no watermark, and no subtitles.

templates.name: Surveillance Animal Encounter
templates.description: Create unique surveillance camera perspective animal interaction videos with night vision effects and fisheye lens distortion
templates.promptTemplate: Low-quality surveillance video style, black and white, {night_vision} in night vision mode, high contrast, rough film texture. Fixed perspective: {lens_type} lens (simulating real cat's eye perspective), peeking from behind the interior door. The light is dim, and the {scene_location} is shrouded in darkness. A huge {main_animal} walks slowly and majestically towards the door with heavy steps. Walking with the {main_animal} is a {companion_animal}. They walk to the door in unison. When they stop in front of the door, the {companion_animal}'s eyes turn to the cat's eye lens (lens position). {action_type}. The {main_animal} is expressionless and indifferent to the {companion_animal}'s behavior. Due to the cat's eye perspective, the edges of the picture are slightly dark. It is quiet all around, with only the faint chirping of insects in the distance.

action_type.label: Action Type
action_type.default: Like a human, the small animal raises one front paw provocatively, deliberately straightening only the longest middle finger

options.value: Like a human, the small animal raises one front paw provocatively, deliberately straightening only the longest middle finger, while all other fingers are tightly bent and retracted, forming a clear and precise movement, imitating the insulting 'middle finger' gesture of humans. The shape of the paw imitates the human hand. The movement is slow and full of irony, and it remains in this position after completion, with eyes penetrating the lens and looking directly at the viewer

templates.name: Windowsill Animal Interview
templates.description: Photorealistic animal interview on windowsill with human-like gestures and voice responses
templates.promptTemplate: A realistic {animal} sitting on a windowsill, calmly gazing outside. Quiet home interior with natural daylight pouring through a window, sheer curtains gently swaying. A reporter appears next to the window with a microphone and asks, 'What should people do after watching this video?' The {animal} turns to the camera, raises one paw â€” now anatomically adjusted to form a perfect human-like {gesture} â€” and confidently says in English, 'Like it.' Photorealistic with light surreal enhancement â€” real fur, lighting, and movement, but the paw forms a clearly defined gesture like a human hand. Camera starts with a mid-shot over the reporter's shoulder, cuts to a tight front-facing close-up of the {animal}'s gesture and face, ends with a slow zoom-out for comedic timing. Peaceful and homey atmosphere with whimsical twist, using soft color tones and warm light.

templates.name: Yeti Mountain Life Vlog
templates.description: POV selfie footage of a Yeti sharing daily life activities in the Himalayan mountains with entertaining commentary
templates.promptTemplate: POV selfie of a realistic white-furred Yeti in {weather_condition} conditions during {time_of_day}, holding a selfie stick with the camera at the end, standing majestically in the Himalayan mountains. {activity_description} The scene unfolds in the breathtaking Himalayan landscape with towering snow-capped peaks reaching into the clouds, pristine glaciers gleaming under natural light, and ancient ice formations creating a dramatic backdrop. Prayer flags flutter in the mountain winds while the thin, crisp air sparkles with ice crystals. Far below, deep valleys disappear into misty clouds, emphasizing the incredible altitude and isolation of this sacred mountain realm. The atmosphere is both serene and powerful, filled with the sounds of mountain winds and distant avalanches echoing through the peaks. National Geographic documentary style, HD quality with cinematic depth of field capturing the majesty of high-altitude wilderness. The Yeti turns to face the camera directly and speaks to the audience in his deep, wise mountain voice: '{voiceover_content}' No background narration or voiceover - only the Yeti's direct speech is heard.
